body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Sean Martinez. Can I get your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sean, my name is Joyce Morris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce! How can I assist you today with our car dealership?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in finding out more about the sedan models you have in stock.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! May I ask for your phone number so I can send you some brochures and offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's three zero nine, five five five, two one four zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. Also, can I have your email address in case we have special promotions to share?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, it's joyce.morris at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you. I will send our current sedan models and special offers right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Joyce. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Sean Martinez and the customer's name is Joyce Morris.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
